meanings: whether someone does something or not

examples.korean: I hear that you’re a writer—is that so? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 작가라고 들었어요. 그런가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.english: That carpet is wearing well, isn’t it? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘There’s been a delay.’ ‘I gathered that.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “도착이 지연되었어요.” “그런가 보다고 생각했어요.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘There’s been a delay.’ ‘I gathered that.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: But is it? You bet it is. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 정말 그런가? 당연히 그렇다. Neungyule
